extraction.title: [CLOSED] UserID still has auto-correct enabled
extraction.description: Issue by jpmens from Friday Jan 03, 2014 at 11:10 GMT Originally opened as binarybucks/mqttitude#248Can that be disabled?
extraction.comments: Comment by ckrey from Friday Jan 03, 2014 at 18:42 GMTIn MQTTitude (IOS) I'm using a different technology than in MQTTInspector. MQTTitude uses the system settings while MQTTinspector does the settings in the app itself.
